post.body: You are truly anointed!
Oh, I see what you're talking abt. I know, it is so sad. That poor baby. How can ANYONE do that?! It angers me as well!
cool!
Hello my brother! How are you?
:) Oh, well thank you! I appreciate that. It's just me being me.
Why thank you! Bless you! May I ask what you're referring to? :)
I've connected! Thanks again.
Thanks Jim. I receive that recommendation!
I know you're right. Thanks for the reminder. I am having a rough time dealing w/Mike's death. It really hurts. But, I know...
bless you! thank you!
My condolences & prayers for strength at this most difficult time. May the Comforter embrace you warmly & closely.
Thank you Wendy! I appreciate it.
That is one of my favorite quotes from Helen Keller. Actually, I love everything from her. Thanks for sharing.
@cpembleton Thank you so much for the condolences. Please keep the Sears family in your prayers, & all of us co-workers.
And then does it link my blog to another website?
Thanks for the follow. It's an honor that you are following me. I believe in the work you're doing, and have sent support.
Yep, board games would be good. Most likely, my 11 yr old daughter will want us to play UNO cards all day! Hubby - chess!
Amen!
LOL! Thank you.
Much gratitude & hugs to you. You've been a pure joy & encouragement since I discovered Twitter several months ago.
LOL! Well, you know, one thing I've learned is that everyone who follows you is not a friend! Look @ the multitudes in the Bible!
Oh how precious you are! Thanks, that's so sweet! Bless you! *blushing*
Hi Lady! How are you? Merry Christmas to ya, just in case I don't get to tweet atcha later!
Although I do repost some things, it wasn't that. It just shocked me. Had no idea how it was all wiped out. Didn't expect it.
She is @SisterBetty1
Have a great weekend everyone! Blessings!
Then going to pick up college daughter in the morning. She's already told me she needs to go shopping once I get her. Whole day! :)
Will most likely not be able to tweet or get back online until 2morrow night. Hubby & I are going 2 a banquet 2nite.
I am asking u to follow & support @lindahillman. Dynamite & powerful lady. I will be a guest on her show in 30 mins. http://snipr.com/7o1mb
I will be interviewed on KWLE WHOLE MInistries radio show 2day @ 3 PM CST. Pls join us. http://snipr.com/7o1mb
Looks Can Be Deceiving! =>My daily inspirational podcast ==> http://snipr.com/7uxeg
We still have snow on the ground & rooftops! It's just beginning to melt. Otherwise, it's a BEAUTIFUL day. Nice & sunny.
Good day everyone. Happy Friday!
Welcome @brotherhebrew, @DivaStyle09, @DianeLHarris, @CLERICAL, @Gettogetha, @UberKevin, @ebay_guru, @BibleSEO
Good night Twitter family!
My prayer of gratitude: Lord, I thank You for sparing my family & I. Trees have been uprooted on my property, but you kept us safe! Thank U!
My prayer 2nite: My prayers are w/those who have experienced damage to property & home in this stretch of storms in the South.
Bidding everyone good night! I'm going 2 get outta here b4 another power outage happens. Will be glad when this winter storm is over!
Wasn't able to post my daily inspirational podcast earlier. May it bless you ==> http://snipr.com/7smmp
Hi new followers: @UstreamTV
Signing off now twitterland! Need 2 get some sleep. Have a lot of writing to do & plan to get an early start. Sweet & pleasant dreams!
My prayer of gratitude: Lord, I thank You for the honor & blessing of knowing YOU! Thanks 4 the peace that surpasses understanding.
I pray for all of those who are affected by the winter & ice storms. Those who have lost power & are suffering from the cold weather.
Nice to meet @Deltavogue, @terrywhalin, @GaryRandall, @mccs1984, @highfiberguru
My prayer 2nite: I pray that God will lift the spirits of those w/heavy hearts. I pray 4 those who are bereaved also those who are depressed
Looking 4ward to interviewing @SisterBetty1 tomorrow on Passion4Life radio show @ 9pm CST. http://snipr.com/8czt5
Wow, I recorded this podcast this morning b4 I learned of my friend's death. I will have to listen to my own words! http://snipr.com/89yl4
I Heard The Bells Today ==>updated blog post ==> http://snipr.com/8cro1
Wow, I recorded this podcast this morning b4 I learned of my friend's death. I will have to listen to my own words! http://snipr.com/89yl4
Have/Do you, or someone you know, suffer(ed) from depression? Especially now? I know a Wonderful Counselor! http://snipr.com/89yl4
Time 2 get some dinner, help daughter w/homework, & take a little break. Will be back later 2nite. Writing some articles. Blessings!
Quick question. What is a PINGBACK on Wordpress?
Good night everyone. Heading to bed. Terrible congestion & sneezing w/this cold. Head feels like it's going to explode. Sweet dreams!
Are you REALLY free? ==updated blog post== you will be blessed by this. I want you to meet this lady. http://tinyurl.com/8go4xc
I am NOT going to do my show tonight. Think I might wash my hair instead!
I was interviewed at www.blogtalkradio.com/wholeministries. It was a wonderful & blessed experience.
Wow! Everybody will be home. Kids are home from school, & hubby will be off work beginning Wed thru Mon. 2 bad we couldn't go away for vac.
Here is my review of the movie Seven Pounds ==> http://tinyurl.com/744luu
Instant Messaging is NOT a new thing. Be blessed by my daily inspirational podcast from Monday. http://snipr.com/91iw9
No One Will Miss Me! Sometimes we feel like that. Be blessed by my daily inspirational message. ==> http://tinyurl.com/6vnubr
